passage.title: Mother is at home
passage.paragraph: Little John is playing in front of a house. A man asks him, "Hi, boy! Is your mother in?" "Yes!" John answers. Then the man rings the doorbell. No one answers. The man asks John, "Nobody is at home?" "Right!" John answers, "But this is not my house. It's Mr. Green's house. He is on holidy with his wife and son."
